General.Name: Starr Peak Exploration Ltd
General.Description: Starr Peak Mining Ltd., an exploration stage junior mining company, engages in the identification, acquisition, and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold. It holds a 100% interest in NewMetal Property comprising 53 mineral claims covering an area of 1,420 hectares located in the northwestern Quebec. The company was formerly known as Starr Peak Exploration Ltd. and changed its name to Starr Peak Mining Ltd. in March 2021. Starr Peak Mining Ltd. was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9
